author: jgm
content: EIP-7251 says of the consolidation contract: "Excess consolidation requests getter - if the input length is zero, return the current excess consolidation requests count."  Is this incorrect?  I would assume that it would return the fee, the same way that the withdrawal contract does.

author: pk910
content: probably hasn't been updated.  It was returning the excess request count in an earlier version. But both contracts return the required fee now

author: .fjl
content: Yeah I forgot to update that

author: jgm
content: I put in a PR for it.
